data.text: Feen naxan nalixi en ma, nde laxi na ra?
Alaa walikɛɛn sabati nɛn a yɛtagi
Anu, a en ma furene sɔxɔlɛn nan tongo,
Anu, muxune a sɔxɔn en yulubine nan ma fe ra,
En birin bata yi lɔ ayi,
A xali nɛn gbaloni, a makiti,
A gaburun lu nɛn muxu ɲaxine yɛ,
Alatala tin nɛn a xa halagi xɔlɛni,
Nanara, n tide gbeen soma a yii nɛn,
